q: Dismissing rumours that Facebook is a threat to Google, he said the growth of the social network phenomenon has actually helped Google as people who used Facebook were also more frequent users of the search engine. Facebook usage is a net positive for us, he said. He denied the rumours that his retirement was because of increased competition from sites such as Facebook.
